name: Aether Escape
description:
This is my entry for the Let's Create Game Jam #2 by Matthewpalaje, made in 10 days. The theme was "psychic powers".

Objective

Escape the dungeon using your special psychic power. You have the ability to dematerialize your body and access the Aether Sphere, where the geometry may be different and ghosts lurk.

Controls

WASD to move.
Use SPACEBAR to switch between the real world and the Aether Sphere.
Use ESC to access the pause menu, where you may exit or respawn.

Development

Created on my own during 10 days (only 3 full days). It is my first Game Jam and my first released video game.

Playtested by Astadriel.

Created with Unity, Blender and Inkscape.
The level modeling have been done with the excellent Realtime CSG from the asset store.

Music is Story at Night (Short Loop 2) from Total Music Collection.
